PHRASE.LANG: You’ll only have to worry about keeping one eye on your enemies. [#Legal]
Jetzt musst du deine Feinde nur noch in einem Auge behalten. [#Legal]
Preoccupati solo di tenere d'occhio i nemici. [#Legal]
Solo tendrás que preocuparte por tener un ojo en tu enemigo. [#Legal]
이제 급하게 달리는 도중에도 한쪽 눈은 편히 쉴 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
You’ll only have to worry about keeping one eye on your enemies. [#Legal]
你只需費心用一隻眼睛盯緊敵人。 [#Legal]
你只需費心用一隻眼睛盯緊敵人。 [#Legal]
You’ll only have to worry about keeping one eye on your enemies. [#Legal]
